dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT servprov_gid carrier, REPLACE(insert_user,'SCOULAR/NVODOM.','') insert_user, TO_CHAR(to_date(insert_date,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'MM/DD/YYYY') insert_date FROM servprov WHERE domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM' AND TO_CHAR(to_date(insert_date,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(to_date(SYSDATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND insert_user <> 'SCOULAR.INTEGRATION' ORDER BY to_date(insert_date,'rrrr-mm-dd')

SELECT COUNT(1) "ROW_COUNT" FROM ( SELECT servprov_gid carrier, REPLACE(insert_user,'SCOULAR/NVODOM.','') insert_user, TO_CHAR(to_date(insert_date,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'MM/DD/YYYY') insert_date FROM servprov WHERE domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM' AND TO_CHAR(to_date(insert_date,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(to_date(SYSDATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND insert_user <> 'SCOULAR.INTEGRATION' ORDER BY to_date(insert_date,'rrrr-mm-dd') )
